attributes.action: take a leaf out churchhills book
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please wake up and smell the coffee. The british people are fed up with the laid back sytle you have our marines captured.Churchhill would have not stand for this nor bringing foreign people over for jobs at home when there are many people claimng benefit and able for work. But all what seems to be happening is more tax and tax to cope with the breaking system which you run. shake up the country and you will be supprised at the support you and your goverment will get. p.s remeber (great britain) not dictated britain. all for one and one for all . Please also bring back national service and see the change.

rejection.details: you need to make it clear which policies you would like to see changed/introduced
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
